name: Avatar

props.name: email
props.description: Email used for Gravatar lookup when src missing.

props.name: name
props.description: Display name used to derive initials for offline fallback.

props.name: gravatarDefault
props.description: Fallback style when no avatar exists.

props.name: preferFallback
props.description: When true and no `src` is provided, prefer offline fallback instead of Gravatar.

props.name: fallback
props.description: Offline fallback strategy when showing a non-network avatar.

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

bestPractices: Use initials fallback for missing images; ensure background/foreground meet contrast.
Keep size tokens consistent across lists, menus, and headers.
Provide alt text or aria-label describing the person or entity.
Avoid using Avatar for content images; use `Image` instead.
Group with labels or presence indicators when they add value; avoid redundant decoration.
